title: 710 - Ship in a Bottle | Sleep With TNG S6 E12
description:
Sleep won’t be simulated but you’ll be de-stimulated as Moriarty walks the corridors of the Enterprise…or does he?

Tonight’s show is sponsored by Quip! The sensitive sonic toothbrush I have been using for over two years (not over and over! Changing out the brush heads every three months!)

*Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://www.getquip.com/sleep, you get your first refill pack for FREE with a quip electric toothbrush. *
